general.name: Abdessalam Dakhissi
general.headline: Full-Stack Engineer & Systems Architect
about: I'm Abdessalam, a full-stack engineer and systems architect who builds production-grade software from the ground upâ€”from UX and frontend development to backend architecture, DevOps pipelines, and AI integration.

I currently work as a Senior Software Engineer at Kiosk360 while also completing dual Master's degrees in Software Engineering and Information Systems Management. Previously, I led engineering at P2SLINK, delivering SaaS platforms across WMS, NMS, medical systems, and AI automation.
I enjoy tackling complex technical challenges and building systems that create real-world impact. Fluent in Arabic, English, and French.
general.summary: Full-stack engineer and systems architect delivering scalable, production-grade systems end-to-end. Currently working as a Senior Software Engineer at Kiosk360 while completing dual Master's degrees in Software Engineering and Information Systems Management.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.description: Building production-grade systems using MERN, .NET microservices, and Electron. Contributed to payment system integrations, service design, system architecture decisions, and code quality improvements. Delivered CI/CD with GitHub Actions and optimized deployment infrastructure using Cloudflare Tunnel, secure VPC setups, and PostgreSQL.

experiences.title: Lead Software Engineer / Systems Architect
experiences.description: Sole engineer responsible for full lifecycle delivery across multiple SaaS platforms. Delivered a WMS using Laravel + Docker + Prometheus/Grafana, a TR-069 auto-configuration server using Spring Boot & ActiveMQ, and an SNMP-based network dashboard using React + Spring Boot. Built a medical platform with Django + React + RabbitMQ and integrated an AI-based ticket triage assistant using LangChain and OpenAI. Managed interns and organized bi-weekly Scrum sprints with CI/CD automation.

experiences.title: Network Support Specialist
experiences.description: Monitored enterprise networks and resolved incidents under strict SLAs. Delivered B2B technical support through ServiceNow and ensured reliability and performance across critical client infrastructures.

experiences.title: Freelancer Software Developer
experiences.description: Built a full-stack web application for a French client, delivering backend, frontend, and containerized deployment with modern engineering practices.

experiences.title: Freelancer Software Developer
experiences.description: Contributed to the development of a Warehouse Management System (WMS) for a major African client, participating in backend development and system design.

education.description: Focus areas: security, system modelling, IT urbanisation

education.subject: Master's

projects.name: Agentic LLM Drone Pilot Framework
projects.framework: Python, LLMs, MQTT, WebSockets, Raspberry Pi
projects.description: Concept-phase control framework for autonomous and semi-autonomous drones using an Event, Check, Act operating model. Designed to combine LLM reasoning with modular hardware capabilities, real-time safety layers, and a unified communication protocol known as L2LP. Features modular plug-and-play packages, strategic LLM planning, embedded rule-based fallback, and fully validated action execution.

projects.name: Web-Based Flight Simulator
projects.description: Advanced flight simulation engine with PS4 controller input, real-time physics, and 2D/3D visualizations. Demonstrates integration of complex real-time systems.

projects.name: Network Management System
projects.description: SNMP-based network monitoring system with modular architecture, real-time device insights, alerting, and performance analytics.

projects.name: AI-Powered Bug Tracker
projects.description: Bug tracking platform featuring NLP-powered classification, automated priority scoring, and AI-assisted ticket triage.

projects.name: AI Project Manager
projects.description: Proof-of-concept AI system that generates task breakdowns, progress summaries, and workflow automation using multi-agent architectures.

projects.name: Medical AI Assistant
projects.description: Healthcare platform offering AI-assisted consultations, appointment scheduling, symptom analysis, and real-time messaging.

projects.name: Warehouse Management System
projects.description: Enterprise WMS with real-time inventory tracking, automated workflows, and integrated monitoring using Prometheus and Grafana.
